definitions.definition: An inanimate object capable of carrying infectious agents (such as bacteria , viruses or prions ), and thus passively enabling their transmission between hosts; common examples include towels, dishcloths, kitchenware/flatware, and laundry.

main_definition: ( medicine ) An inanimate object capable of carrying infectious agents (such as bacteria , viruses or prions ), and thus passively enabling their transmission between hosts; common examples include towels, dishcloths, kitchenware/flatware, and laundry.
